Body:
"""plot a single tile"""
nparr = get_test_array(is_xda=False)
xda = get_test_array(is_xda=True)
for t in xda.tile.values:
    ecco.plot_tile(nparr[t, ...], **vdict)
    plt.close()
    ecco.plot_tile(xda.sel(tile=t), **vdict)
    plt.close()
pytest.mark.parametrize('vdict', [{}, {'cmap': 'plasma'}, {'show_colorbar':
    True}, {'show_colorbar': True, 'show_cbar_label': True, 'cbar_label':
    'something good'}, {'show_tile_labels': False}, {'less_output': False}])
